title: Spouse Competes With Phone for Wife's Attention

lines.linesSec1: DEAR ABBY: My wife and I have been married for 35 years. She's the best. However, for the last few years I feel like she fits our relationship in between her texting and emails, and not the other way around. Should I feel hurt or just roll with the times? -- NEGLECTED IN FLORIDA.
lines.linesSec2: DEAR NEGLECTED: Neither one. What you should do is tell your wife of 35 years that she is making you feel like No. 3 on her list of priorities. The squeaky wheel gets the grease.
